description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a compact book card, including image, author, title, rating, and price. It handles user interaction by navigating to a detailed book view.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a compact visual summary of a book, used in lists and grids.

methods.name: _openDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the book detail page using the book's ID.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying the book card, including image, author, title, rating, and price.
